name: SliceR (itch)
description:
SliceR is a 2d comedic dating simulation that puts the player into a fictional horror movie villain that is trying to turn their life around and find a date.

Use the mouse to advance the dialog and make a dialog selection.

Created by:
Manuel Cabacungan - Programmer
Aaron Daly - Lead Programmer
Lauren Pham - Music Director
Robert "Doc" Rose - Technical Artist
Rob Silva - Art Director
